verses.verse: וּבֹ֨עַז <WH1162> Boaz עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> up הַשַּׁעַר֮ <WH8179> to the gate וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat him down שָׁם֒ <WH8033> there וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold הַגֹּאֵ֤ל <WH1350> there and behold the kinsman עֹבֵר֙ <WH5674> came אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of whom דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> spake בֹּ֔עַז <WH1162> of whom Boaz וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> by unto whom he said ס֥וּרָה <WH5493> turn aside שְׁבָה־ <WH3427> sit down פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> here פְּלֹנִ֣י <WH6423> such אַלְמֹנִ֑י <WH492> a one וַיָּ֖סַר <WH5493> here And he turned aside וַיֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> and sat down

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> And he took עֲשָׂרָ֧ה <WH6235> ten אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH582> men מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> of the elders הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said שְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> Sit ye down פֹ֑ה <WH6311> here וַיֵּשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <WH3427> here And they sat down

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said לַגֹּאֵ֔ל <WH1350> unto the kinsman חֶלְקַת֙ <WH2513> a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> out of the country אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לְאָחִ֖ינוּ <WH251> which [was] our brother לֶאֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH458> Elimelech's מָכְרָ֣ה <WH4376> selleth נָעֳמִ֔י <WH5281> Naomi הַשָּׁ֖בָה <WH7725> that is come again מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> of land מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַאֲנִ֨י <WH589> I אָמַ֜רְתִּי <WH559> And I thought אֶגְלֶ֧ה <WH1540> advertise אָזְנְךָ֣ <WH241> you לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> thee saying קְ֠נֵה <WH7069> Buy נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before הַֽיֹּשְׁבִים֮ <WH3427> [it] before the inhabitants וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> and before זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and before the elders עַמִּי֒ <WH5971> of my people אִם־ <WH518> If תִּגְאַל֙ <WH1350> If thou wilt redeem גְּאָ֔ל <WH1350> [it] redeem וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> not יִגְאַ֜ל <WH1350> [it] but if thou wilt not redeem הַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> [it then] tell לִּ֗י [וְאֵדַע כ] (וְאֵֽדְעָה֙ <WH3045> acknowledge ק) כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> there זוּלָֽתְךָ֙ <WH2108> [it] beside לִגְא֔וֹל <WH1350> for [there is] none to redeem וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <WH310> thee and I [am] after וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> thee And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I אֶגְאָֽל׃ <WH1350> I will redeem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said בֹּ֔עַז <WH1162> Boaz בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> What day קְנוֹתְךָ֥ <WH7069> thou buyest הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> the field מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> of the hand נָעֳמִ֑י <WH5281> of Naomi וּ֠מֵאֵת <WH854> for ר֣וּת <WH7327> [it] also of Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <WH4125> the Moabitess אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> the wife הַמֵּת֙ <WH4191> of the dead [קָנִיתִי כ] (קָנִ֔יתָה <WH7069> buy ק) לְהָקִ֥ים <WH6965> to raise up שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמֵּ֖ת <WH4191> of the dead עַל־ <WH5921> on נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> upon his inheritance

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַגֹּאֵ֗ל <WH1350> And the kinsman לֹ֤א <WH3808> not אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> I cannot [לִגְאֹול־ כ] (לִגְאָל־ <WH1350> Redeem ק) <WH1350> redeem פֶּן־ <WH6435> because אַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> [it] for myself lest I mar אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתִ֑י <WH5159> mine own inheritance גְּאַל־ <WH1350> redeem לְךָ֤ אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you אֶת־ <WH853> גְּאֻלָּתִ֔י <WH1353> thou my right כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not אוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> to thyself for I cannot לִגְאֹֽל׃ <WH1350> redeem

וְזֹאת֩ <WH2063> in לְפָנִ֨ים <WH6440> Now this [was the manner] in former time בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> in Israel עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַגְּאוּלָּ֤ה <WH1353> concerning redeeming וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַתְּמוּרָה֙ <WH8545> and concerning changing לְקַיֵּ֣ם <WH6965> for to confirm כָּל־ <WH3605> any דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> all things שָׁלַ֥ף <WH8025> plucked off אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> a man נַעֲל֖וֹ <WH5275> his shoe וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> and gave לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> [it] to his neighbour וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> was the הַתְּעוּדָ֖ה <WH8584> and this [was] a testimony בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel
וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said הַגֹּאֵ֛ל <WH1350> Therefore the kinsman לְבֹ֖עַז <WH1162> unto Boaz קְנֵה־ <WH7069> Buy לָ֑ךְ וַיִּשְׁלֹ֖ף <WH8025> [it] for thee So he drew off נַעֲלֽוֹ׃ <WH5275> his shoe

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said בֹּ֨עַז <WH1162> And Boaz לַזְּקֵנִ֜ים <WH2205> unto the elders וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> and [unto] all the people עֵדִ֤ים <WH5707> Ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day כִּ֤י <WH3588> for קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7069> that I have bought אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that לֶֽאֱלִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH458> all that [was] Elimelech's וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לְכִלְי֖וֹן <WH3630> and all that [was] Chilion's וּמַחְל֑וֹן <WH4248> and Mahlon's מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> of the hand נָעֳמִֽי׃ <WH5281> of Naomi

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> Moreover אֶת־ <WH853> ר֣וּת <WH7327> Moreover Ruth הַמֹּאֲבִיָּה֩ <WH4125> the Moabitess אֵ֨שֶׁת <WH802> the wife מַחְל֜וֹן <WH4248> of Mahlon קָנִ֧יתִי <WH7069> have I purchased לִ֣י לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> to be my wife לְהָקִ֤ים <WH6965> to raise up שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמֵּת֙ <WH4191> of the dead עַל־ <WH5921> on נַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> upon his inheritance וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יִכָּרֵ֧ת <WH3772> be not cut off שֵׁם־ <WH8034> that the name הַמֵּ֛ת <WH4191> of the dead מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> from among אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> his brethren וּמִשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> and from the gate מְקוֹמ֑וֹ <WH4725> of his place עֵדִ֥ים <WH5707> ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> this day

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said כָּל־ <WH3605> All הָעָ֧ם <WH5971> And all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בַּשַּׁ֛עַר <WH8179> that [were] in the gate וְהַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> and the elders עֵדִ֑ים <WH5707> [We are] witnesses יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> make יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> the woman הַבָּאָ֣ה <WH935> that is come אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּיתֶ֗ךָ <WH1004> into thine house כְּרָחֵ֤ל ׀ <WH7354> like Rachel וּכְלֵאָה֙ <WH3812> and like Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> of whom בָּנ֤וּ <WH1129> did build שְׁתֵּיהֶם֙ <WH8147> which two אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do חַ֣יִל <WH2428> thou worthily בְּאֶפְרָ֔תָה <WH672> in Ephratah וּקְרָא־ <WH7121> and become שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> base בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> in Bethlehem

וִיהִ֤י <WH1961> become בֵֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1004> And let thy house כְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be like the house פֶּ֔רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> bare תָמָ֖ר <WH8559> whom Tamar לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> unto Judah מִן־ <WH4480> through הַזֶּ֗רַע <WH2233> of the seed אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> shall give יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD לְךָ֔ מִן־ <WH4480> through הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <WH5291> thee of this young woman הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took בֹּ֤עַז <WH1162> So Boaz אֶת־ <WH853> רוּת֙ <WH7327> Ruth וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> became ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> and she was his wife וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and when he went in אֵלֶ֑יהָ <WH413> about וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto her the LORD לָ֛הּ הֵרָי֖וֹן <WH2032> her conception וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and she bare בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> a son

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְנָה <WH559> said הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> And the women אֶֽל־ <WH413> to נָעֳמִ֔י <WH5281> unto Naomi בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> who לֹ֣א <WH3808> has not הִשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> which hath not left לָ֛ךְ גֹּאֵ֖ל <WH1350> without a kinsman הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee this day וְיִקָּרֵ֥א <WH7121> may be famous שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> that his name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וְהָ֤יָה <WH1961> become לָךְ֙ לְמֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> And he shall be unto thee a restorer נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> of [thy] life וּלְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <WH3557> and a nourisher אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׂיבָתֵ֑ךְ <WH7872> of thine old age כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כַלָּתֵ֤ךְ <WH3618> for thy daughter in law אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אֲהֵבַ֙תֶךְ֙ <WH157> which loveth יְלָדַ֔תּוּ <WH3205> hath born אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הִיא֙ <WH1931> and is ט֣וֹבָה <WH2896> thee which is better לָ֔ךְ מִשִּׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> to thee than seven בָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> sons

וַתִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took נָעֳמִ֤י <WH5281> And Naomi אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֙לֶד֙ <WH3206> the child וַתְּשִׁתֵ֣הוּ <WH7896> and laid בְחֵיקָ֔הּ <WH2436> it in her bosom וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> and became ל֖וֹ לְאֹמֶֽנֶת׃ <WH539> and became nurse

וַתִּקְרֶאנָה֩ <WH7121> gave ל֨וֹ הַשְּׁכֵנ֥וֹת <WH7934> And the women her neighbours שֵׁם֙ <WH8034> it a name לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> born בֵּ֖ן <WH1121> There is a son לְנָעֳמִ֑י <WH5281> to Naomi וַתִּקְרֶ֤אנָֽה <WH7121> and they called שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> his name עוֹבֵ֔ד <WH5744> Obed ה֥וּא <WH1931> He אֲבִי־ <WH1> he [is] the father יִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> of Jesse אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father דָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David פ
וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these תּוֹלְד֣וֹת <WH8435> Now these [are] the generations פָּ֔רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez פֶּ֖רֶץ <WH6557> Pharez הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> חֶצְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2696> Hezron
וְחֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> And Hezron הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> רָ֔ם <WH7410> Ram וְרָ֖ם <WH7410> and Ram הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּֽינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> Amminadab

וְעַמִּֽינָדָב֙ <WH5992> And Amminadab הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> נַחְשׁ֔וֹן <WH5177> Nahshon וְנַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> and Nahshon הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שַׂלְמָֽה׃ <WH8009> Salmon
וְשַׂלְמוֹן֙ <WH8012> And Salmon הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בֹּ֔עַז <WH1162> Boaz וּבֹ֖עַז <WH1162> and Boaz הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עוֹבֵֽד׃ <WH5744> Obed
וְעֹבֵד֙ <WH5744> And Obed הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יִשָׁ֔י <WH3448> Jesse וְיִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> and Jesse הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David
